pr_title: Ignore implicit config params in EngineTestKit by default

timeline.message:
Make EngineTestKit ignore implicit config params by default

Resolves #2285.

timeline.bodyHTML:

public LauncherDiscoveryRequestBuilder enableImplicitConfigurationParameters(
